DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of Valacyclovir Hydrochlorothiazide Caplet under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of Valacyclovir Hydrochloride 1000 mg Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to valacyclovir hydrochloride or any comparable or similar product.
